name: Filament
description:
With persistent curiosity we create unexpectedly clever experiences.
We believe that in order to design and build something for humans, you need to understand the humans who will experience and benefit from it. Through conversation and research, we inform our expertise and assumptions with knowledge. It's that small step that separates us from other agencies.
We strive to be a fresh voice and to always say, with courteous regard, what we think—even if they might be tough to hear. We tell the truth because everyone should be on the same page to make work, and the work we do, awesome.
We create incredible client partnerships with those that value making a positive impact on their business through design and a deep understanding of their audience. We work with Fortune 500, high-growth startups and exciting, purpose-driven organizations. 
If you like bullet points and you're wondering if we can work together here are our services:
Discovery & Ideation
Digital Strategy
UX Design
UI Design
Front-end Programming
Back-end Programming
Mobile Design and Development
Social Management
SEO/SEM
Content Marketing
Analytics & Data Mining
